title: Interops Metadata schema
description: Provides common metadata relevant to Interops events

runId.description: The ID associated to the run for which this event was created

runDateTime.description: The date and time when the run was initiated

upstreamReferences.description: Set of upstream references that triggered this event

id.description: The FHIR ID for this reference

backfillID.description: The UUID for this backfill request

backfillStartDate.description: The start of the date range to use for EHR searches

backfillEndDate.description: The end of the date range to use for EHR searches
